name: Arachnobatics
description:
Spider climb and jump your way to the goal!

This game was made for Mini Jam 123 (Jan 5th to Jan 8th, 2023, jam link), under the jam's objective:

"Mini jam is a 72-hour-long video game development jam that occurs every two weeks on Itch.io.

A required limitation is announced as soon as the jam starts to spice things up.   [...]  This jam's theme is Web.

The limitation is a special condition that your game must follow, but is open to interpretation. [...]

Limitation: There is no ground"

Controls:

  • Click into the game to lock the mouse, Escape to unlock the mouse
  • Look with mouse
  • Move with WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump with spacebar

This is a quick game to play though, as it had to be completed within the 72 hour jam period.

This game uses assets, including:

Action RPG Music Free -- VGcomposer (Unity Asset Store)

Halloween Cemetery Set -- 3dfancy (Unity Asset Store)

Fantasy Skybox Free -- Render Knight (Unity Asset Store)

Spider Character Spiders Pack - Fantasy RPG -- Infinity PBR (Unity Asset Store)
